fields.summary: SDK 7.5.0 breaks support for external javascript libraries

comments.body:
Which platform are you having this issue on? Android? iOS?
I assume iOS.

Because Android didn't support {{File.read()}} of JS files for device/production builds until 7.5.0 as can be seen here [TIMOB-16678].
Hello [~peterladis], Can you follow up here? did you follow Gary's guide on using require instead of include? Let us know. Thanks.

[~peterladis],
 Did you manage to follow Gary's suggestion and test this on SDK
7.5.1.GA . Please update it on your end by executing   *appc ti sdk install latest* and let us know the results.
